brand.name: Palace
brand.description: Palace is a London-based skateboarding brand known for its unique and bold designs.

brand.name: Bape
brand.description: Bape, short for A Bathing Ape, is a Japanese streetwear brand popular for its iconic ape logo and camouflage patterns.

brand.name: Supreme
brand.description: Supreme is a New York City skateboarding brand recognized for its collaborations, limited releases, and distinctive red box logo.
